lead_paragraph: ELMO--John Sebastian. March 10, 1929 - June 2, 2016, distinguished Fellow of the American Society of Interior Designers (ASID), died peacefully after an eleven- year battle with Leukemia. Noted worldwide designer of interior products, residential, commercial and governmental interiors, he was surrounded by his close-knit and loving family: daughter, Jacqueline Lipson; grandchildren, Louis Lipson; Second Lieutenant Harry Lipson; and Annabella Lipson; son Major General David S. Elmo, with wife Anne, son Kerry with wife Silvia Poelmann, and great grandchildren, Eva, Max, Lisa Poelmann and Alina Kramer. John was predeceased by his wife of 48 years, Barbara Gibbs Elmo. Visiting Sunday (today) 2-4pm and 7-9pm at Edwards-Dowdle Funeral Home, 64 Ashford Ave., Dobbs Ferry, NY, 10522. Graveside service Monday, June 6, 2016 at 10am, at Mount Hope Cemetery, 50 Jackson Ave, Hastings-On-Hudson, NY 10706. Contributions in his name should be sent to John's selected charity, a fund that assists student designers: Education Legacy Fund (ASID), 1040 First Ave, Suite 324, New York, NY, 10022. edwardsanddowdle.com. 1/3
